thread.title: BRIEF-TTM Technologies Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.40

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TTM Technologies Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.40
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Ttm Technologies Inc:
* TTM TECHNOLOGIES, INC. REPORTS FISCAL FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.57 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.40 * Q4 SALES $739.3 MILLION VERSUS $706.5 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.22 TO $0.28 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $610 MILLION TO $660 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.52, REVENUE VIEW $727.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
